code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var slice=createSlice({name:'app',initialState:{error:null,bottomSheetOpen:false},reducers:{setError:function setError(state,action){state.error=action.payload;},setBottomSheetOpen:function setBottomSheetOpen(state,action){state.bottomSheetOpen=action.payload;}}});export default slice.reducer;export var setError=function setError(payload){return{type:'app/setError',payload:payload};};export var setBottomSheetOpen=function setBottomSheetOpen(payload){return{type:'app/setBottomSheetOpen',payload:payload};};
